mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board(parent_id, category_id, user_id, type_id, title, body, state, is_hide, is_complete, is_anonymous, created_at, modified_at, comment_cnt, like_cnt, report_cnt, images_url) VALUES(#{parentId}, #{categoryId}, #{userId}, #{typeId}, #{title}, #{body}, #{state}, #{isHide}, #{isComplete}, #{isAnonymous}, NOW(), NOW(), #{commentCnt}, #{likeCnt}, #{reportCnt}, #{imagesUrl})
mapper.delete: delete from board_like where board_id = #{boardId} and user_id = #{userId}
mapper.insert: insert into board_report(board_id, user_id, report_id) values (#{boardId}, #{userId}, #{reportId})
mapper.select: select * from board where title like '%#{keyword}%' or body like '%#{keyword}%'
